message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with a price of $1200000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me. What are your thoughts?

I understand that $900000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1100000. This is my best and final offer on this price, but I'm open to negotiating further if you're willing to meet me at this price.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit higher than $1100000. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement at this price.

I'm still not willing to go as low as $950000, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1050000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement at this price.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $975000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement at this price.
